name: Web Development Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of web development and build your first website.

syllabus.content: Basic HTML tags and document structure.
CSS selectors, properties, and layout.

name: Data Science for Beginners
description: Explore the fundamentals of data science and gain hands-on experience with Python.

syllabus.content: Overview of data science, role of a data scientist.
Using Python for data analysis and visualization.

name: Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp
description: A comprehensive bootcamp covering front-end and back-end web development.

syllabus.content: Basic HTML tags and document structure.
Building server-side applications with Node.js and Express.js.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: An introduction to machine learning algorithms and applications.

syllabus.content: Overview of machine learning concepts and applications.
Classification and regression algorithms.

name: Mobile App Design Principles
description: Learn the principles of mobile app design and user experience.

syllabus.content: Fundamental principles of designing for mobile.
Creating effective and user-friendly interfaces.

name: Advanced JavaScript Frameworks
description: Explore advanced concepts in popular JavaScript frameworks.

syllabus.content: Overview of popular frameworks.
Building web applications with React.

name: Python for Data Science and Analysis
description: Learn Python for data analysis and gain insights into data science techniques.

syllabus.content: Basics of Python programming language.
Working with data using the Pandas library.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: An introduction to cybersecurity concepts and best practices.

syllabus.content: Overview of cybersecurity threats and defenses.
Securing computer networks and data.

name: UX/UI Design Principles
description: Explore user experience and user interface design principles for digital products.

syllabus.content: Fundamentals of user-centered design.
Creating wireframes and interactive prototypes.

name: Blockchain Basics
description: Introduction to the fundamental concepts of blockchain technology.

syllabus.content: Introduction to the fundamental concepts of blockchain.
Understanding cryptocurrencies and creating smart contracts.
